column4: hey guys.. this is not OS specific again then maybe it is.. but what could cause a cpu to over heat (as high as 98C)? but load be relatively low idle 10-30%? and cpu scaling working?
are you monitoring the temp in Ubuntu or in the BIOS?
ï»¿try going into the BIOS, see if it gives you a different reading - When I monitor temps in GNOME, I always get -7 degrees Celsius, which is... impossible.
